11.98: This one is equal to the whole world.
11.100: The whole entire world was not created except to join to this one / l’tsavot l’zeh.
11.93: “The end of the word/matter/davar, everything is (has been) heard, fear Ha’elohim [and keep His commandments, for this is the whole human]” [Ec 12:13]
11.92: Every person that has fear/awe of the heavens, his words are heard, as it is said,
11.94: What is [the meaning of], “for this/zeh is the whole human”?...
11.96: The Holy One said: The whole entire world was not created except for the sake of this one / bish’vil zeh.
